title: Scenario: Clicking on standings from a team specific page
custom_preconds:
Given
The current page is one of the team websites such that wap.milb.com/<file_code>
custom_steps:
When
The standings link is clicked on
custom_expected:
Then
http://wap.milb.com/<file code>/standings/ is opened

title: Scenario: Standings Dropdowns for MiLB
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL should be http://wap.milb.com/standings
custom_expected:
Then
The top of the page should say standings 
and
the drop down should contain the following options (International, Pacific Coast, Mexican, Eastern, Southern, Texas, California, Carolina, Florida State, Midwest, South Atlantic, New York-Penn, Northwest, Appalachian, Pioneer, Arizona, Gulf Coast, Dominican Summer, Venezuelan Summer)

title: Scenario: Default Standings for MiLB
custom_expected:
Then
The default league that is selected is International

title: Scenario: Standings Stat Types
custom_steps:
When
The season has more than 1 month left of playing time
custom_expected:
Then
The stats that are available are W, L, PCT, GB, L10

title: Scenario: Standings Stat Types When the Season is Ending or Over
custom_steps:
When
The season is over or there is less than 1 month of playing games
custom_expected:
Then
The column Elim should be appended to the end of the stats on the standings page so the stats should be (W, L, PCT, GB, L10, ELIM)

title: Scenario: Elim column when season is over
custom_expected:
Then
There should be an E for every team except for the top team (order wise) in each division. The top team should show a '-'.

title: Scenario: League Half Buttons
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL is 
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=111
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=109
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=110
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=122
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=123
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=118
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=116
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=126
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=128
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled up below the drop down to view other leagues and above the divisions.
custom_expected:
Then
There should be two buttons here 1ST HALF and 2ND Half

title: Scenario: League Default selected button
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL is
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=111
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=109
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=110
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=122
or

or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=118
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=116
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=126
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=128
custom_steps:
When
The page is loaded normally.
custom_expected:
Then
On default the depressed button should be the 1ST HALF button.

title: Scenario: League Selecting the 1ST HALF button
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL is
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=111
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=109
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=110
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=122
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=123
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=118
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=116
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=126
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=128
custom_steps:
When
The 1st Half Button is clicked on
custom_expected:
Then
The URL should have this appended to the end &half=1
and
the 1ST HALF button should be blue
and
the 2ND HALF button should be white

title: Scenario: Half League Key
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL is
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=111
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=109
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=110
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=122
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=123
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=118
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=116
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=126
or
http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=128
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to view the key.
custom_expected:
Then
The key shows 5 markers
* first-half division winner
$ first-half Wild Card winner
@ clinched playoff
\# clinched division
& clinched Wild Card

title: Scenario: International League Divisions
custom_steps:
When
International is selected from the drop down
custom_expected:
Then
The url is now http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=117
and
There are 3 divisions within international (International League North, International League South, International League West)

title: Scenario: Interntional League key
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the bottom to view the key
custom_expected:
Then
The key should indicate that there are 2 markers
\# for clinched division
& for clinched Wild Card

title: Scenario: International League Markers show up correclty
custom_preconds:
Given
The url is http://wap.milb.com/standings/?l=117
and the season has ended
custom_expected:
Then
There should be three teams (one in each division) marked with the # and that team should be the first team in the division (order wise)
and 
one team in the league marked with the & and that team should be the second team in the division (order wise)

title: Scenario: Pacific Coast League Divisions
custom_steps:
When
The drop down is opened 
and
Pacific Coast is selected
custom_expected:
Then
The url is http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=112
and
The divisions are Pacific Coast League American Northern and Pacific Coast League American Southern and Pacific Coast League Pacific Northern and Pacific Coast League Pacific Southern

title: Scenario: Pacific Coast League Key
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the bottom to view the key
custom_expected:
Then
The key contains one symbol which is # which signifies clinched division

title: Scenario: Pacific Coast League Markers show up correctly
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL is http://wapb.milb.com/standings/?l=112
and
the season has ended.
custom_expected:
Then
There should be 3 teams that have the # marker to the left of their rows. The marker should be on the first team in each division (order wise).

title: Scenario: Mexican League Divisions
custom_expected:
Then
The two divisions are Mexican League Norte
and 
Mexican League Sur

title: Scenario: Mexican League Key
custom_steps:
When

custom_expected:
Then

* for first half division winner
$ for first half wild card winner
@ for clinched playoff
\# for clinched division
& for clinched wildcard
